messages.subject: NEED YOUR INPUT! PLS.... www.shinsengumidb.com
messages.msgSnippet: I think I made a mistake on the ratings on the database... I mean I grouped yaoi stories PG-R together and then a separate yaoi NC17. Do you think I should
messages.messageBody:
I think I made a mistake on the ratings on the database... I mean I
grouped yaoi stories PG-R together and then a separate yaoi NC17. Do
you think I should have a separate rating for each yaoi and not group
them?

Also another issue I'm having is the characters... Basically since I
want it to be a Shinsengumi site, the most popular (or at least I
think they're popular) miburo members are there and I grouped all the
RK characters together in "other RK". There is no specifics as to
Kenshin, Kauro, Sano, Aoshi etc... I was thinking of adding
a "Harada"/"Sanosuke" but someone commented that it was probably not
a good idea as they should not be confused. *sigh*

So basically if you wanted to find a SaitouxSano story or Saitou x
male for the matter you just have to settle for filtering for Saitou
and Yaoi. Does anyone have any suggestions. There are a number of
Yaoi stories now on the site but it's fine if I have to go and change
them.

Please take a look at how the site is presented in the details
section and the search/add functions... I need input right away...
It's growing (101 fanfics plus a bunch more that I have permission
to add but not there yet) but if I'm making changes I have to do it
now before I put in another folder of authors in there....

You can place your comments here OR in the "contributors page" in DB
http://www.shinsengumidb.com

Once this is done... I plan to work on the fan-art and musicvids...
Then back to the commercial section (which really NEEDS a lot of
work).

Minna... Thanks for all your help...

----------
Sec, I have not made a banner yet... Quite clueless on where to start
as I am not artistically inclined nor do I know what programs to
use...
